snippet: The rejection of a motion from a conservative group seeking to defend the gay-marriage ban means a ruling on a challenge to the law may follow shortly.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge Michael J McShane denies motion by conservative National Organization for Marriage to intervene on behalf of Oregon's ban on same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: The rejection of a motion from a conservative group seeking to defend the gay-marriage ban means a ruling on a challenge to the law may follow shortly.

headline.main: Judge Blocks Motion to Defend Oregon Gay Marriage Ban
headline.print_headline: Judge Blocks Motion to Defend Oregon Marriage Ban

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
